heading: Wednesday Night
text: Variable clouds, except mostly cloudy far south. Lows from the upper 20s to mid 30s, except mid to upper 30s far south, and in the broad valleys west. Winds becoming light, variable to east.

heading: Thursday
text: Mostly cloudy. A rising chance of showers starting mid morning along and west of the Greens; arriving mainly mid to late afternoon in areas east of the Greens. Highs in the low to mid 50s, with some upper 40s in the Adirondacks. East winds 5 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph in southern areas.

heading: Thursday Night
text: Cloudy and breezy with periods of rain. Lows in the upper 30s to lower 40s north, mid to upper 40s in the south. East winds 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 30 mph, except possible gusting to 45 mph along the western slopes of the Greens.
